definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
(old) jade tablet (a ceremonial badge of rank)

sentences.english: Freight prepaid to Buenos aires in transit to Asuncion Paraguay.

sentences.english: Paraguay, which shares the dam with Brazil, also suffered a major blackout.
sentences.chinese: 與巴西共用大壩的巴拉圭也遭受了大停電。

sentences.english: They kick off their campaign against Paraguay tomorrow night.
sentences.chinese: 他們脫掉他們明天晚上對陣巴拉圭。

sentences.english: Paraguay beats Japan 5-3 on penalties at World Cup.
sentences.chinese: 世界盃上巴拉圭在點球大戰中5比3擊敗日本。

sentences.english: Tupi people of Brazil and Paraguay.

sentences.english: He wants to run for the Presidency of Paraguay and changes the corruptive phenomenon of the society.
sentences.chinese: 他要競選巴拉圭總統，改變社會的腐敗現象。

sentences.english: Actually , yerba mates , which is this very soothing tea drink.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，喝的是巴拉圭茶，那是一種讓人很輕鬆的茶。

sentences.english: England won Paraguay 1 - 0 , for No 4's own goal of Paraguay.
sentences.chinese: 英格蘭因爲巴拉圭4號的烏龍球，最後以1比0獲勝。

sentences.english: Paraguayan authorities say much more is needed.
sentences.chinese: 但巴拉圭當局稱，這些遠不足夠。
